DOC.brief_summary: In present study , serum pentraxin 3 level relationship insulin resistance determine patient Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS . It find PTX3 level increase patient PCOS positively correlate HOMA-IR .
DOC.brief_title: High Plasma Level Long Pentraxin 3 Associated With Insulin Resistance Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS )
DOC.criteria: Absence significant abnormality physical examination except hirsutism No lipid lowering , hypoglycemic , antihypertensive hormone replacement therapy Normal thyroid function prolactin level Absence history evidence metabolic , cardiovascular , respiratory hepatic disease Pregnant Possible ovarian tumor , Congenital adrenal hyperplasia BMI great 35 kg/m2
